text: Nell of the Circus is a 1914 four-act drama film written, directed by, and starring actress Cecil Spooner. The film was based on a play Spooner had frequently starred in, in New York, called Polly of the Circus. The film is thought to be lost. == Plot == Nell of the Circus centers around a forbidden marriage between a wealthy heiress and a circus performer, and their daughter, Nell. == Cast == * Cecil Spooner as Nell * Richard Garrick (role unknown) == References == Category:1914 films Category:Silent films Category:Silent film stubs
title: Nell of the Circus
